title: Simple Chinese Recipes
description: This inspirational cookbook features a fascinating range of Chinese recipes which can be easily and quickly prepared in your own home. They include traditional favorites such as Aromatic and Crispy Duck, Sweet and Sour Pork, and Barbecued Spare Ribs, as well as less familiar but equally delicious dishes. Detailed instructions and step-by-step photographs make each meal easy to cook and serve. Whatever your skill level, you'll find this book a pleasure to use.
author: Whitecap Books
